article_title: The medical device tax repeal effort is back. Will it pass this time?

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON — The U.S. Capitol can be an unpredictable place. But every Congress, you can count on at least one thing: 3rd District Rep.

og.description: Rep. Erik Paulsen continues his efforts to repeat the medical device tax. With 27,000 med-tech jobs in the state, he's gaining wide support from the delegation.
og.title: The medical device tax repeal effort is back. Will it pass this time?
